name: Presidential Election Generator
description:
This is a little game that generates random politicians, with random names, home states, ages, and, of course, political beliefs. You can vote for whichever candidate you like best (or none at all), and watch them win or lose the United States presidency. The game has a fully functional Electoral College, and even a House of Representatives contingent election in the case of a tie. Have fun generating!

Also, important to note, as the views of the candidates in this game are randomly generated, they do not reflect the views of anyone who worked on this game.
